entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
